Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

Protocol.description: Configuration settings for NFS or SMB protocol.

NFS.description: NFS protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.

SMB.description: SMB protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.

properties.name: Domain
properties.description: The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.

type.description: The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.

properties.name: Password
properties.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

type.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

properties.name: User
properties.description: The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

type.description: The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

NfsMountOptions.description: The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.

type.description: The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.

SmbMountOptions.description: The mount options used by DataSync to access the SMB server.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The specific SMB version that you want DataSync to use to mount your SMB share.

type.description: The specific SMB version that you want DataSync to use to mount your SMB share.

properties.name: StorageVirtualMachineArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONTAP SVM.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONTAP SVM.

properties.name: SecurityGroupArns
properties.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx ONTAP file system.

type.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx ONTAP file system.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.

type.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: FsxFilesystemArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONAP file system.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONAP file system.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx ONTAP file system location that is created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx ONTAP file system location that is created.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the FSx ONTAP file system that was described.

type.description: The URL of the FSx ONTAP file system that was described.
